item.title: Data Structures: Queues and Stacks
item.description: So much of writing code comes down to organizing data in a logical, efficient way, and data structures play a huge role in allowing us to do this effectively. Today, we’ll explore the difference between stacks and queues.
item.dc:creator: Anna Zhao
item.content:encoded: So much of writing code comes down to organizing data in a logical, efficient way, and data structures play a huge role in allowing us to do this effectively. Today, we’ll explore the difference between stacks and queues.
